1.verse: UYakobi, umkhonzi kaThixo neNkosi uYesu Kristu, ubhalela izizwe ezilishumi elinazibini eziziintsali, ebulisa.

2.verse: Kubaleleni ekuthini kuluvuyo olukhulu, bazalwana bam, xa nithe nagaxeleka ezilingweni ngezilingo,

3.verse: nisazi nje ukuba ucikido lokholo lwenu lusebenza umonde.

4.verse: Umonde ke mawube nomsebenzi ozalisekileyo, ukuze nibe ngabazalisekileyo, abagqibeleleyo, ningaswele nto.

5.verse: Ukuba ke ubani kuni uswele ubulumko, makacele kuThixo, onika bonke engenakumbi, engangcikivi; wobunikwa.

6.verse: Ke makacele ekholwa, engathandabuzi; kuba lowo uthandabuzayo ufana nokulatyuza kolwandle, luqhutywa ngumoya, luntsileka.

7.verse: Kuba loo mntu makangabi uya kwamkela nto kuyo iNkosi.

8.verse: Indoda emphefumlo umbaxa iyahlozinga kuzo zonke iindlela zayo.

9.verse: Ke umzalwana othobekileyo makaqhayise ngako ukuphakama kwakhe;

10.verse: osisityebi ke makaqhayise ngako ukuthobeka kwakhe; ngokuba uya kudlula njengentyantyambo yengca.

11.verse: Kuba lithi lakuphuma ilanga, kunye nolophu, liyitshise ingca, ize ke intyantyambo yayo ivuthuluke, buthi nobuhle bembonakalo yayo butshabalale; siya kwenjenjalo nesityebi ukungcumbeka eluhambeni lwaso.

12.verse: Inoyolo indoda ekunyamezelayo ukulingwa; ngokuba yothi,  yakuba icikidekile, isamkele isithsaba sobomi, ebabeke ngedinga iNkosi abo bayithandayo.

13.verse: Makungabikho namnye utshoyo akuhendwa ukuthi, Ndihendwa kwaThixo; kuba uThixo akanakuhendeka kokubi, akahendi namnye ke yena.

14.verse: Elowo ke uhendwa akutsalwa, abanjiswe, yeyakhe inkanuko.

15.verse: Ithi inkanuko, yakuba ithabathile, izale isono; sithi ke isono, sakuba sikhulelwe, sizale ukufa.

17.verse: Sonke isipho esilungileyo, naso sonke isipho esigqibeleleyo, sesaphezulu; sihla sivela kuye uYise wezikhanyiso, ongenabuyambo nasithunzi sakujika.

18.verse: Uthandile, wasizala ngelizwi lenyaniso, ukuze sibe yintlahlela yazo izidalwa zakhe.

19.verse: Ngoko ke, bazalwana bam baziintanda, makathi umntu wonke enze msinya ukuva, enze kade ukuthetha, enze kade ukuqumba;

20.verse: kuba ingqumbo yendoda ayisebenzi bulungisa bukaThixo.

21.verse: Kungoko endithi, yithini, nibubekile nxamnye bonke ubunyhukunyhuku nokuphuphuma ulunya, namkele ninobulali ilizwi elimiselweyo kuni, elinako ukuyisindisa imiphefumlo yenu.

22.verse: Yibani ke ngabenzi belizwi, ningabi ngabaphulaphuli kodwa,  nizidephisela.

23.verse: Ngokuba umntu, ukuba ungumphulaphuli nje welizwi, engemenzi walo, lowo ufana nendoda eqiqa ubuso bayo bobuntu esipilini;

24.verse: kuba iyaziqiqa, imke, ilibale kwaoko ukuba ibinjani na.

25.verse: Ke yena oqondela emthethweni ogqibeleleyo wayo inkululeko,  ahlale ehleli kuwo, lowo, ethe nje akaba ngumphulaphuli olibalayo, esuke waba ngumenzi womsebenzi: yena uya kuba noyolo ekwenzeni kwakhe.

26.verse: Ukuba ubani kuni uba ungonqulayo, abe engalubambi ngomkhala ulwimi lwakhe, elukuhla intliziyo yakhe, unqulo lwalowo alunto yanto.

27.verse: Unqulo lona oluhlambulukileyo, olu ngadyobhekileyo phambi koThixo uBawo, lulo olu: kukuvelela iinkedama nabahlolokazi embandezelweni, yabo: kukuzigcina engenabala kulo ihlabathi.

1.verse: Bazalwana bam, musani ukukuphatha ngokukhetha buso bamntu,  ukukholwa yiNkosi yethu yozuko, uYesu Kristu.

2.verse: Kuba, xa kuthe kwangena endlwini yenu yesikhungu indoda enemisesane yegolide, inengubo eqaqambileyo; kwaza ke kwangena ihlwempu, lineengubo ezimdaka;

3.verse: naza nakhangela kulowo uvethe ingubo eqaqambileyo, nathi kuye, Hlala apha kakuhle wena; nathi kulo ihlwempu, Yima phaya wena; mhlawumbi, Hlala phantsi apha ngasesihlalweni seenyawo zam:

4.verse: anicalulanga na ke phakathi kwenu, naba ngabagwebi abanezicamango ezingendawo?

5.verse: Yivani, bazalwana bam baziintanda: uThixo akawanyulanga na amahlwempu eli hlabathi, ukuba abe zizityebi zokholo,  neendlalifa zobukumkani, awababeka ngedinga abo bamthandayo?

6.verse: Ke nina nilihlazisile ihlwempu. Izityebi azinishicileli na?  Zona azinirholeli ematyaleni na?

7.verse: Zona azilinyelisi na igama elihle elo, nabizwa ngalo?

8.verse: Ukuba okunene niyawuzalisa umthetho wakomkhulu,  ngokwesibhalo esithi, Uze umthande ummelwane wakho ngoko uzithanda ngako, nityaphile;

9.verse: kodwa ukuba nikhetha ubuso bomntu, nisebenza isono,  niyohlwaywa ngumthetho ngokwabagqithi.

10.verse: Kuba yena oya kuwugcina umthetho uphela, akhubeke mthethweni mnye, unetyala layo yonke.

11.verse: Kuba lowo wathi, Musa ukukrexeza, ubuye wathi, Musa ukubulala. Ke, ukuba akukrexezi, kodwa ubulala, usewuthe waba ngumgqithi-mthetho.

12.verse: Yithini ukuthetha, yithini ukwenza, nenze njengabaza kugwetywa ngomthetho wenkululeko.

13.verse: Kuba umgwebo awuyi kuba natarhu kulowo ungenzanga nceba;  kananjalo inceba iyawuqhayisela umgwebo.

14.verse: Kunceda ntoni na, bazalwana bam, ukuba umntu uthi unokholo,  abe imisebenzi ke engenayo? Lunako yini na ukumsindisa ukholo lwakhe?

15.verse: Ukuba ke umzalwana, nokuba ngudade, bathi bahambe ze,  beswele ukudla imihla ngemihla,

16.verse: athi ke omnye wenu kubo, Hambani ninoxolo, yothani,  hluthani; nibe ke ningabaniki izinto ezo ziwufaneleyo umzimba:  kunceda ntoni na?

17.verse: Ngokunjalo nalo ukholo, ukuba luthi lungabi namisebenzi,  lufile ngokukokwalo.

18.verse: Wosuka omnye, athi, Wena unokholo, ke mna ndinemisebenzi;  ndibonise ukholo lwakho olungenamisebenzi yakho; nam ndokubonisa ngokwasemisebenzini yam ukholo lwam.

19.verse: Wena uyakholwa ukuba uThixo mnye; uyatyapha; nazo iidemon ziyakholwa, zibe namanwele.

20.verse: Uyathanda na ke ukwazi, mntundini ungento, ukuba ukholo olu, ingekho imisebenzi, lufile?

21.verse: UAbraham, ubawo wethu, akagwetyelwanga na ngokwasemisebenzini, akumnikela uIsake, unyana wakhe, phezu kwesibingelelo?

22.verse: Uyabona ukuba ukholo lwalusebenzisana nemisebenzi yakhe,  lwenziwa wagqibelela ukholo ngokwasemisebenzini?

23.verse: Saza sazaliseka isibhalo esithi, Wakholwa ke uAbraham nguye uThixo; kwaza oko kwabalelwa ebulungiseni kuye, wabizwa ngokuba sisihlobo sikaThixo.

24.verse: Niyabona ke ngoko, ukuba umntu uyagwetyelwa ngokwasemisebenzini; kungabi ngokwaselukholweni lodwa.

25.verse: Ngokunjalo ke, noRahabhi, ihenyukazi, akagwetyelwanga na ngokwasemisebenzini, akubamkela ngobubele abathunywa,  abakhuphele phandle ngayimbi indlela?

26.verse: Kuba, kwanjengokuba umzimba, ungekho umoya, ufile,  ngokunjalo ukholo, ingekho imisebenzi, lufile nalo.

1.verse: Musani ukuba ngabafundisi abaninzi, bazalwana bam, nisazi nje ukuba siya kwamkela olona lukhulu ugwebo.

2.verse: Kuba siyakhubeka kaninzi sonke. Ukuba umntu akakhubeki zwini, lowo uyindoda egqibeleleyo, enako ukuwubamba ngomkhala nawo umzimba uphela.

3.verse: Yabona, sifaka imikhala emilonyeni yamahashe, ukuba asithambele, siwajike umzimba wawo uphela.

4.verse: Yabona, nayo imikhombe, imikhulu kangaka nje, iqhutywa nje yimimoya enamandla, ijikwa ngomthi wokujika omncinanana, iye apho sukuba umlawuli angxamele ukuba ingaya ngakhona.

5.verse: Ngokunjalo nalo ulwimi, lulilungu elincinanana nje,  luyagwagwisa kakhulu. Yabona ke, umlilo omncinane utshisa ihlathi elikhulu.

6.verse: Nolwimi olu ngumlilo, lihlabathi elizele kukungalungisi;  lunjalo ulwimi ukuhlala phakathi kwamalungu ethu. Lona luyawudyobha umzimba uphela, luvuthisa intenda yobomi; lona ke luvuthiswa sisihogo somlilo.

7.verse: Kuba zonke iimvelo zezinto ezizitho zine, kwanezeentaka,  nezezinambuzane, kwanezezinto eziselwandle, ziyadanjiswa,  kanjalo sezikhe zadanjiswa yimvelo eyiyeyabantu;

8.verse: ke lona ulwimi alunaye noko amnye ebantwini, unokuludambisa;  lubububi obungenakubanjwa, luzele bubuhlungu obubulalayo.

9.verse: Ngalo siyambonga uThixo uYise, nangalo siyabaqalekisa abantu abenziwe ngokomfanekiselo kaThixo.

10.verse: Kwakulo mlomo mnye kuphuma intsikelelo nengqalekiso.  Akufanelekile, bazalwana bam, ukuba ezi zinto zibe nje.

11.verse: Umthombo umpompoza amnandi nakrakra kwangelo liso linye,  yini na?

12.verse: Unako yini na, bazalwana bam, umkhiwane ukuvelisa iinkozo zomnquma, uthi umdiliya uvelise amakhiwane? Ngokunjalo akukho namnye umthombo ongavelisa amanzi amtyuba namnandi.

13.verse: Ngubani na olumkileyo, owaziyo kakuhle phakathi kwenu?  Makayibonise imisebenzi yakhe ngehambo entle, enobulali bobulumko.

14.verse: Ke, ukuba ninomona okrakra neyelenqe entliziyweni yenu,  musani ukuyiqhayisela nokuyixoka inyaniso.

15.verse: Obo bulumko asibubo obuhla phezulu; bobasemhlabeni,  bobemvelo, bobeedemon.

16.verse: Kuba apho kukhoyo umona neyelenqe, kubakho isiphithiphithi nemicimbi emibi yonke.

17.verse: Ke bona ubulumko baphezulu ukuqala bunyulu, buze bube boboxolo; buyancendezela, buthozame kakuhle, buzele yinceba neziqhamo ezilungileyo; abunankani, abunaluhanahaniso.

18.verse: Isiqhamo ke sobulungisa sihlwayelwa ngoxolo ngabo benza uxolo.

1.verse: Zivela phi na iimfazwe nokulwa phakathi kwenu? Aziveli na apha eziyolweni zenu, eziwaphumela umkhosi amalungu enu?

2.verse: Niyakhanuka, ningabi nakuzuza nto noko; niyabulala, nizonde,  ningabi nakufumana nto noko; niyalwa, nenze imfazwe, ningabi nakuzuza nto ke, ngenxa yokuba ningaceli.

3.verse: Niyacela, ningamkeli noko, ngenxa enokuba nicela kakubi,  ukuze oko nikuchithele iziyolo zenu.

4.verse: Bakrexezindini, bakrexezikazindini, anazi na ukuba ubuhlobo balo ihlabathi bubutshaba kuye uThixo? Othe ngoko wanga angaba sisihlobo salo ihlabathi, uzenza utshaba lukaThixo.

5.verse: Okanye niba isibhalo esi sifumana sisitsho na, ukuthi, Umoya owahlala ngaphakathi kwethu ulangazelela ukukhweleta?

6.verse: Ke ubabala kakhulu ngakumbi. Kungoko sithi, UThixo uyabachasa abanekratshi, abababale abazithobileyo.

7.verse: Mthobeleni ngoko uThixo. Mchaseni ke uMtyholi, wonibaleka.

8.verse: Sondelani kuye uThixo, wosondela kuni. Hlambululani izandla,  boni, nenze nyulu iintliziyo, nina bamphefumlo umbaxa.

9.verse: Yibani ziindwayi, nikhedame, nilile; ukuhleka kwenu makujike kube kukukhedama, nalo uvuyo lwenu lube kukuthi dakumba.

11.verse: Musani ukuthetha okubi omnye ngomnye, bazalwana. Lowo uthetha okubi ngomzalwana, amgwebe umzalwana wakhe, uthetha okubi ngomthetho, agwebe umthetho; ke, ukuba uyawugweba umthetho, akumenzi wamthetho, ungumgwebi.

12.verse: Mnye uMmisi-mthetho, lowo unako ukusindisa nokutshabalalisa; ungubani na wena, umgwebayo omnye?

13.verse: Wenani kaloku, nina nitshoyo ukuthi, Namhla, nokuba kungomso, siya kuya kulaa mzi, senze khona umnyaka ube mnye,  sirhwebe, sizuze;

14.verse: kanti nina aba anikwazi kakuhle okwangomso. Kuba buyintoni na ubomi benu? Bungumphunga obonakala ixesha elincinane, uze ke uthi shwaka.

15.verse: Endaweni yokuba nithi, Ukuba iNkosi ithe yathanda, saphila,  siya kwenza le nto, nalaa nto.

16.verse: Ngoku ke niqhayisa ngokuqhankqalaza kwenu; konke ukuqhayisa okunjalo akundawo.

17.verse: Ngoko kowaziyo ukwenza okuhle, angakwenzi, kulowo kusisono.

1.verse: Wenani kaloku, zityebi, lilani nenze isijwili ngeenkxwaleko zenu ezizayo.

2.verse: Ubutyebi benu bubolile, neengubo zenu zidliwe ngamanundu.

3.verse: Igolide nesilivere yenu idliwe ngumhlwa; umhlwa wazo uya kuba lingqina ngakuni, uyidle inyama yenu njengomlilo.  Niziqwebele ubutyebi ngeemini zokugqibela.

4.verse: Yabonani, umvuzo wabasebenzi, abavune amasimi enu, lowo ubandeziweyo nini, uyakhala; kwaye ukubhomboloza kwabavuni abo kungenile ezindlebeni zeNkosi yemikhosi.

5.verse: Nadla ubuncwane emhlabeni apha, naxhamla iziyolo, nazondla iintliziyo zenu njengamhla kuxheliweyo.

7.verse: Nyamezelani ngoko, bazalwana, ide ifike iNkosi. Niyabona,  umlimi uyasilinda isiqhamo sawo umhlaba esinexabiso elikhulu,  anyamezele ngaso, side samkele eyaphambili neyasemva imvula.

8.verse: Nyamezelani nani, zizimaseni iintliziyo zenu, ngokuba ukufika kweNkosi kusondele.

9.verse: Musani ukukrokrelana omnye nomnye, bazalwana, ukuze ningagwetywa; yabonani, uMgwebi umi phambi komnyango.

10.verse: Bathabatheni, bazalwana bam, abaprofeti ababethetha egameni leNkosi, babe ngumzekelo wokuva ubunzima, nowokunyamezela.

11.verse: Yabonani, sithi, banoyolo abo banyamezelayo. Unyamezelo lukaYobhi naluva, nesigqibo seNkosi nasibona, ngokuba iNkosi inemfesane enkulu, inenceba.

12.verse: Ke kaloku, ngaphezu kweento zonke, bazalwana bam, musani ukufunga, nokuba lizulu, nokuba ngumhlaba, nokuba sesinye isifungo esiyini; makathi ke uewe wenu abe nguewe, nohayi abe nguhayi, ukuze ningeyeli ekugwetyweni.

13.verse: Kukho mntu na phakathi kwenu uva ububi? Makathandaze. Kukho mntu na unomxhelo owonwabileyo? Makenze indumiso.

14.verse: Kukho mntu na ufayo phakathi kwenu? Makabizele kuye amadoda amakhulu alo ibandla, athandaze wona phezu kwakhe, akuba emthambisile ngeoli, egameni leNkosi;

15.verse: wothi umthandazo wokholo umsindise lowo uleleyo, iNkosi imvuse; nokuba ubethe wenza izono, wozixolelwa.

16.verse: Xelelanani iziphoso, nithandazelane, ukuze niphiliswe.  Sinamandla kakhulu isikhungo selungisa, siyeyisa.

17.verse: UEliya wayengumntu oluvo lunjengolwethu, wathandaza umthandazo ukuba ingani; ayana emhlabeni iminyaka emithathu eneenyanga ezintandathu.

18.verse: Wabuya wathandaza, laza izulu lanika imvula, umhlaba wavelisa isiqhamo sawo.

19.verse: Bazalwana, ukuba uthe omnye phakathi kwenu walahleka enyanisweni, wathi ubani wamguqula,

20.verse: makazi ukuba lowo wamguqulayo umoni ekulahlekeni kwakhe,  woba usindise umphefumlo ekufeni, wagubungela inkitha yezono.
